item.description: The work culture evolved like 5 years in early 2020. Now, Iâ€™ve summarised my experiences working with remote teams and clients in the last half-decade. How to maintain human contacts, how to be productive, and what tools & apps I recommend for your team to maximize efficiency.
item.author: proactive.d20@gmail.com (proactive-dev)

item.title: What is developer productivity and how to measure it?
item.description: Developer productivity, in general, refers to how productive a developer is during a specific period of time or based on any criteria. An organization would design objectives or metrics to track and set goals to attain or set a baseline of what is acceptable in order to be able to gauge developer productivity.
item.author: proactive.d20@gmail.com (proactive-dev)

item.title: Why code maintenance is difficult
item.description: When you are a programmer, you need to be able to do what you can do, and when you are a software developer, you need to be able to do what you can't do.
